2025-07-03.title: Arrival and Drinks at the Hotel
2025-07-03.description: Prior to the ceremony, enjoy some refreshments and grab yourself a drink from the bar!

2025-07-03.title: Ceremony
2025-07-03.description: It's time to say I do!

2025-07-03.title: Drinks Reception
2025-07-03.description: Drinks and canapes will be served.

2025-07-03.title: Wedding Breakfast
2025-07-03.description: A 3 course meal will be served. Please when you RSVP let us know any dietary requirements.

2025-07-03.title: Evening Reception
2025-07-03.description: Bring your dancing shoes, we're partying till midnight! Don't worry there will be food and cake.
